AboutMe.title: About me
AboutMe.firstParagraph: I'm a Front End Developer living in Barcelona. I consider myself a very disciplined person with a lot of attention to detail who loves to set difficult challenges.
AboutMe.secondParagraph: Before the pandemic my role was as an office coordinator, managing a group of 10 colleagues in a multi-national car rental company, but due to the situation we found ourselves in, I decided to turn my life around and go into programming.
AboutMe.thirdParagraph: In 2020 I started studying Front End and UX/UI Design at the IT Academy of Barcelona Activa, where I learned the most used technologies in the market, such as JavaScript, Angular, version control with Git and database management with MySQL.
AboutMe.fourthParagraph: Just after finishing the course, I decided to go one step further by learning React and Node.js on my own, as they are the technologies that most caught my attention.
AboutMe.fifthParagraph: In my free time I enjoy learning new technologies and applying them to my personal projects, reading, sports and music.
AboutMe.sixthParagraph: I am currently working on improving my skills as a Front End Developer, Back End Developer and UX/UI Designer.
AboutMe.seventhParagraph: On the other hand, I am open to new opportunities, so if you think I can fit in your team, do not hesitate to contact me.
